channel.title: CVE Feed for WPClever -- WPC Product Bundles for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-52127|2024-01-05T08:52:47.172Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20product%20bundles%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPClever WPC Product Bundles for WooCommerce.This issue affects WPC Product Bundles for WooCommerce: from n/a through 7.3.1.
